lyrics:
3 contributorst for texas lyricsintro
one two

verse 1
t for texas t for tennessee
t for texas t for tennessee
t for thelma the gal that made a wreck out of me

verse 2
if you dont want me mama you sure dont have to stall
if you dont want me mama you sure dont have to stall
i can get more women than a passenger train can haul

verse 3
im gonna buy me a pistol just as long as im tall
im gonna buy me a pistol just as long as im tall
im gonna shoot poor thelma just to see her jump and fall

verse 4
and if thats your mama you better tie her to your side
if thats your mama better tie her to your side
cause if she flags my train im sure gonna let her ride

verse 5
im gonna buy me a shotgun with a great long shiny barrel
im gonna buy me a shotgun with a great long shiny barrel
im gonna shoot that rounder that stole away my gal
you might also likeverse 6
id rather drink muddy water than sleep down in a hollow log
id rather drink muddy water than to sleep down in a hollow log
than to be in atlanta treated like a dirty dog

verse 7
well its t for texas t for tennessee
t for texas t for tennessee
t for thelma the gal that made a wreck out of meembed
